tt.pre: 1 //======================================================================== 2 //Project Name: AXI4-APB4 Bridge 3 //File name: x2p_top.sv 4 //Description: AXI-APB Bridge Design complied to AXI4 and APB4 protocol 5 //Design Engineer: Nguyen Ngoc Man 6 //======================================================================== 7 module x2p_top(aclk, 8 aresetn, 9 awvalid, 10 awaddr, 11 awsize, 12 awlen, 13 awburst, 14 awid, 15 awprot, 16 awready, 17 arvalid, 18 araddr, 19 arsize, 20 arlen, 21 arburst, 22 arid, 23 arprot, 24 arready, 25 wvalid, 26 wdata, 27 wstrb, 28 wlast, 29 wready, 30 rready, 31 rvalid, 32 rresp, 33 rlast, 34 rid, 35 rdata, 36 bready, 37 bvalid, 38 bresp, 39 bid, 40 pclk, 41 preset_n, 42 pready, 43 prdata, 44 pslverr, 45 paddr, 46 pwdata, 47 psel, 48 penable, 49 pprot, 50 pstrb, 51 pwrite 52 ); 53 //*************************************************************** 54 //declare ports 55 //*************************************************************** 56 input logic aclk; 57 input logic aresetn; 58 //ports declaration 59 // Address write chanel 60 input logic awvalid; 61 input logic [31:0] awaddr; 62 input logic [2:0] awsize; 63 input logic [7:0] awlen; 64 input logic [1:0] awburst; 65 input logic [7:0] awid; 66 input logic [2:0] awprot; 67 output logic awready; 68 // address read chanel 69 input logic arvalid; 70 input logic [31:0] araddr; 71 input logic [2:0] arsize; 72 input logic [7:0] arlen; 73 input logic [1:0] arburst; 74 input logic [7:0] arid; 75 input logic [2:0] arprot; 76 output logic arready; 77 //write data chanel 78 input logic wvalid; 79 input logic [31:0] wdata; 80 input logic [3:0] wstrb; 81 input logic wlast; 82 output logic wready; 83 //read data chanel 84 input logic rready; 85 output logic rvalid; 86 output logic [1:0] rresp; 87 output logic rlast; 88 output logic [7:0] rid; 89 output logic [31:0] rdata; 90 //write data chanel 91 input logic bready; 92 output logic bvalid; 93 output logic [1:0] bresp; 94 output logic [7:0] bid; 95 //APB interface 96 input logic pclk; 97 input logic preset_n; 98 input logic [`SLAVE_CNT-1:0] pready; 99 input logic [`SLAVE_CNT-1:0][31:0] prdata; 100 input logic [`SLAVE_CNT-1:0] pslverr; 101 output logic [31:0] paddr; 102 output logic [31:0] pwdata; 103 output logic [`SLAVE_CNT-1:0] psel; 104 output logic penable; 105 output logic [2:0] pprot; 106 output logic [3:0] pstrb; 107 output logic pwrite; 108 //*************************************************************** 109 //WIRE VARIABLES 110 //*************************************************************** 111 //AXI TRANSACTION CONTROLLER outputs 112 logic [31:0] selected_addr; 113 logic [7:0] selected_len; 114 logic [2:0] selected_size; 115 logic [1:0] selected_burst; 116 logic [2:0] selected_prot; 117 logic [31:0] wdata_to_apb; 118 logic [3:0] wstrb_to_apb; 119 logic next_transfer_rdy; 120 logic trans_go; 121 //ARBITER output 122 logic [1:0] used_grant; 123 //COUNTER outputs 124 logic burst_almost_done; 125 logic burst_done; 126 //APB MASTER outputs 127 //---send to AXI transaction controller 128 logic [31:0] prdataX; 129 logic pslverrX; 130 logic write_to_rd_sfifo; 131 logic read_from_wd_sfifo; 132 logic dec_error; 133 logic latch_resp; 134 //---send counter 135 logic set_up_phase; 136 logic beat_cnt_incr; 137 //*************************************************************** 138 //SUB_MODULES 139 //*************************************************************** 140 axi_transaction_controller axi_slv_inst ( 141 //global signals 142 .aclk(aclk), 143 .aresetn(aresetn), 144 //addres write channel 145 .awvalid(awvalid), 146 .awaddr(awaddr), 147 .awsize(awsize), 148 .awlen(awlen), 149 .awburst(awburst), 150 .awid(awid), 151 .awprot(awprot), 152 .awready(awready), 153 //address read chanel 154 .arvalid(arvalid), 155 .araddr(araddr), 156 .arsize(arsize), 157 .arlen(arlen), 158 .arburst(arburst), 159 .arid(arid), 160 .arprot(arprot), 161 .arready(arready), 162 //write data chanel 163 .wvalid(wvalid), 164 .wdata(wdata), 165 .wstrb(wstrb), 166 .wlast(wlast), 167 .wready(wready), 168 //read data chanel 169 .rready(rready), 170 .rvalid(rvalid), 171 .rresp(rresp), 172 .rlast(rlast), 173 .rid(rid), 174 .rdata(rdata), 175 //write respond chanel 176 .bready(bready), 177 .bvalid(bvalid), 178 .bresp(bresp), 179 .bid(bid), 180 //counter input 181 .burst_almost_done_i(burst_almost_done), 182 .burst_done_i(burst_done), 183 //arbiter input 184 .grant_i(used_grant), 185 //apb master input 186 .prdata_i(prdataX), 187 .pslverr_i(pslverrX), 188 .write_to_rd_sfifo_i(write_to_rd_sfifo), 189 .read_from_wd_sfifo_i(read_from_wd_sfifo), 190 .dec_error_i(dec_error), 191 .latch_resp_i(latch_resp), 192 // 193 .selected_addr_o(selected_addr), 194 .selected_len_o(selected_len), 195 .selected_size_o(selected_size), 196 .selected_burst_o(selected_burst), 197 .selected_prot_o(selected_prot), 198 //WDATA 199 .wdata_to_apb_o(wdata_to_apb), 200 .wstrb_to_apb_o(wstrb_to_apb), 201 // 202 .next_transfer_rdy_o(next_transfer_rdy), 203 .trans_go_o(trans_go) 204 // 205 // 206 ); 207 // 208 //ARBITER 209 // 210 arbiter arbiter_inst( 211 .aclk(aclk), 212 .aresetn(aresetn), 213 .sfifo_ar_empty_i(sfifo_ar_empty), 214 .sfifo_aw_empty_i(sfifo_aw_empty), 215 .burst_done_i(burst_done), 216 .burst_go_i(trans_go), 217 // 218 .used_grant_o(used_grant) 219 // 220 ); 221 // 222 //COUNTER 223 // 224 counter cnt_inst( 225 .pclk(pclk), 226 .preset_n(preset_n), 227 .len_of_burst_i(len_of_burst), 228 .set_up_phase_i(set_up_phase), 229 .beat_cnt_incr_i(beat_cnt_incr), 230 // 231 .burst_almost_done_o(burst_almost_done), 232 .burst_done_o(burst_done) 233 // 234 ); 235 // 236 //APB MASTER 237 // 238 apb_master apb_mst_inst( 239 .pclk(pclk), 240 .preset_n(preset_n), 241 // 242 //control signal 243 // 244 .trans_go_i(trans_go), 245 .next_transfer_rdy_i(next_transfer_rdy), 246 .end_of_burst_i(burst_done), 247 .grant_to_write_i(used_grant[1]), 248 .wstrb_to_apb_i(wstrb_to_apb), 249 .wdata_to_apb_i(wdata_to_apb), 250 .start_addr_i(selected_addr), 251 .len_of_burst_i(selected_len), 252 .size_of_transfer_i(selected_size), 253 .used_burst_i(selected_burst), 254 .used_prot_i(selected_prot), 255 //APB interface 256 .paddr(paddr), 257 .pprot(pprot), 258 .psel(psel), 259 .penable(penable), 260 .pwrite(pwrite), 261 .pwdata(pwdata), 262 .pstrb(pstrb), 263 .pready(pready), 264 .prdata(prdata), 265 .pslverr(pslverr), 266 //send to AXI transaction controller 267 .prdataX_o(prdataX), 268 .pslverrX_o(pslverrX), 269 //control outputs 270 .write_to_rd_sfifo_o(write_to_rd_sfifo), 271 .read_from_wd_sfifo_o(read_from_wd_sfifo), 272 .set_up_phase_o(set_up_phase), 273 .beat_cnt_incr_o(beat_cnt_incr), 274 .dec_error_o(dec_error), 275 .latch_resp_o(latch_resp) 276 // 277 // 278 // 279 280 ); 281 // 282 // 283 // 284 endmodule: x2p_top
